document_data.caption: ''Three of the Ranking Agents of the Rundeen. Jafar el Uabar is the one at the lower right.''
document_data.name: Daudon yn Saibh el Yakan
document_data.mainbody: '''Daudon yn Saibh el Yakan''' was the [[Rundeen#Organization|Nirdey]] of [[Memnon]] for the [[Rundeen]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.History: Daudon worked for many years as a bandit, bodyguard, and enforcer for the Rundeen until his age made it difficult to do these jobs, so he asked for a more sedentary job and was appointed as Nirdey of Memnon. Using his past acquaintances, he now used his talent to recruit men to protect Rundeen caravans and to assault non-Rundeen targets. Daudon also hired adventurers for some missions.
